name: Jack Spriggan
description: Jack Spriggan is a Virtual Reality platformer that lets you climb, leap and swing up the surface of a gigantic beanstalk. Featuring beautiful and expansive environments, visceral combat, and surprising discoveries, it's an adventure like none you've ever experienced!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4690 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7-4790 Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 970 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
